title: Blended Learning Design and Application Based on Multimedia in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Improving multimedia utilization skills and developing metacognition-based learning strategies in language education

learning_goals: Learners can create and utilize at least three types of language learning materials using various multimedia tools.
Learners can design and implement two or more integration strategies between digital and face-to-face instruction in blended learning environments.
Learners can improve learning efficiency by at least 20% by applying metacognitive monitoring techniques during multimedia-based learning processes.

resources: Augmented Reality (AR) content for language learning

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
